mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeBoardTBL(notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer) VALUES(#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_writer})
mapper.select: select * from noticeBoardTBL order by notice_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeBoardTBL set notice_count = notice_count+1 WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no};
mapper.select: select * from noticeBoardTBL order by notice_count DESC
select * from noticeBoardTBL order by notice_no DESC limit #{skip}, #{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE noticeBoardTBL SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_content = #{notice_content} WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * from noticeBoardTBL where notice_title like concat('%',#{search},'%')
